title: Mountaintop View 1 - 28 - 25 Players of Week , Too Much Jesus ?, Alford week recap and other Monday news
body_text:
The last Tuesday of January begins with the weekly basketball player honors, has content on whether a football head coach’s faith is too much, and includes more basketball content as the sprint to the regular season championship marches forward. Enjoy!!
Mountaintop View 1-28-25 Players of Week, Too Much Jesus?, Alford week recap and other Monday news
MW MBB Players of the Week
And on the women’s side…
Boise State head football coach Spencer Danielson is very outspoken about his faith. As Bronco Nation News’ Mike Prater opines in this article, is it too much or just right?
Nevada MBB Head Coach Steve Alford recaps winless Pack week
The glory years of the 80s and 90s for UNLV basketball have been followed by missteps over the last 35 years after the dismissal of legendary head coach Jerry Tarkanian. With another season for fits and starts, does the program need to completely disintegrate before a proper rebuild starts?
Colorado State is one game back in the loss column behind New Mexico and Utah State in the regular season conference standings. Can they keep up with the pace against Air Force tonight? See the game preview here.
On the horizon:
- Later today: Reacts Survey: MBB Basketball
- Later today: The Good, The Bad, The Ugly: Revisiting Preseason Predictions #1
- Later today: Hike’s Peak Podcast Episode 87
- Coming Wednesday: Peak Perspective: 2024 OOC Season Review
